data_table.description: Ultrasound Imputed Values, White Males, Exam 2. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: LOPBDA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, left common carotid: optimal angle [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 2]

variable.name: ROPBDA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, right common carotid: optimal angle [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 2]

variable.name: LBIBDA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, left bifurcation [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 2]

variable.name: RBIBDA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, right bifurcation [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 2]

variable.name: LINBDA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, left internal carotid [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 2]

variable.name: RINBDA45
variable.description: Derived average far wall thickness, right internal carotid [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 2]

variable.name: RESPONS2
variable.description: Number of observed sites [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 2]

variable.name: SUM2WT45
variable.description: Number of observed values / 6 = weight for Sum45_21, 2, or 3 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 2]

variable.name: LOPBWA45
variable.description: Weight for LOPBDA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 2]

variable.name: ROPBWA45
variable.description: Weight for ROPBDA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 2]

variable.name: LBIBWA45
variable.description: Weight for LBIBDA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 2]

variable.name: RBIBWA45
variable.description: Weight for RBIBDA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 2]

variable.name: LINBWA45
variable.description: Weight for LINBDA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 2]

variable.name: RINBWA45
variable.description: Weight for RINBDA45 [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 2]

variable.name: SUM45_21
variable.description: Mean of the DA45 variables [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 2]

variable.name: SUM45_22
variable.description: Weighted mean of the DA45 variables [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 2]

variable.name: SUM45_23
variable.description: Z-score summary statistic for the DA45 variables [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 2]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Ultrasound Imputed Values, white males, exam 2]
